actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Bureau of Reclamation to expend $1,000,000 of the funds made available to the North Loup division, Nebraska, in fiscal year 1988, for the Davis Creek Dam as provided in Public Law 100-202, the continuing resolution for fiscal year 1988.

summary.text: Directs the Bureau of Reclamation to expend $1,000,000 of the funds made available to the North Loup division, Nebraska, in FY 1988 for the Davis Creek Dam.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Bureau of Reclamation to expend $1,000,000 of the funds made available to the North Loup division, Nebraska, in fiscal year 1988, for the Davis Creek Dam as provided in Public Law 100-202, the continuing resolution for fiscal year 1988.
